ActorTalk: Wanna head downstairs for a drink?
Those two customers over there look kind of shady...
They should be chatting in the dining area, but it's like they're scoping the place out...
And seriously, who carries a sugar bowl around?
This whole "sugar" thing must be another one of their dirty tricks, bear!
Shh... I'm keeping an eye on suspicious targets...
Two-person op. Keeps things under wraps.
